description:
It's been about a year and a half since I last filmed Dylan. He was one of my favorite models, but unfortunately (for me) he met a girl who simply wouldn't tolerate him being in adult films.
About a month ago, Dylan called to tell me they had broken up and that he was playing the field again. Needless to say, I didn't waste any time getting him out here.
When I picked Dylan up from the airport, the first thing I noticed was how different he looked. His hair was longer and he'd leaned up quite a bit. His personality also seemed a bit different... he was friendlier and more expressive than before.
We spent the afternoon catching up, and before I knew it I had talked him into taking a big dildo up his ass. This surprised me as he had never been receptive to it before.
So we did the video and I was astounded... not only did he take a big dildo up his ass, he actually enjoyed it and he made noise! He was moaning and biting the sheets and it didn't seem like he could get enough. Definitely a whole new Dylan... I'll have to write his ex a thank-you note!
I had a great time with Dylan that afternoon and it was great seeing him again. But of course now I can't wait to get the real thing up his hot little ass!
title: Dylan's Toys!
